name: tic-tac-toe
description: Socket IO Admin UI - https://admin.socket.io/ Login with: http://localhost:8080/admin

scripts.start: cd server && npm install && node server.js
scripts.heroku-postbuild: cd client && npm install && npm run build
scripts.devStart: concurrently "cd client && npm run start" "cd server && npm run devStart"
scripts.install-client-server: concurrently "cd client && npm install" "cd server && npm install "
